DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate physical activity level change young adult start specific exercise program .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate physical activity level change young adult start specific exercise program . Physical activity level monitor daily via FitBit Flex . Outcome measure include number minute activity per day distance travel per day .
DOC.criteria: 1840 year old , stable physical/mental health , current smoker currently minimally active , ambulatory , interested increase physical activity , willingness attend weekly exercise intervention session SNAP Fitness location within 10 mile University Minnesota campus , ability comply study protocol provide inform consent Contraindications increase physical activity include , limited , abnormal electrocardiogram V02 test result , high blood pressure ( define systolic blood pressure 165 diastolic blood pressure 100 ) , heart attack , acute ( 2 day ) cardiac event stroke precede six month , unstable angina , uncontrolled dysrhythmias cause hemodynamic compromise , symptomatic severe aortic stenosis , uncontrolled symptomatic heart failure , acute pulmonary embolism pulmonary infarction , acute myocarditis pericarditis , dissect aneurism , acute systemic infection unstable pulmonary cardiovascular condition .
